library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```{r}

source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))

Rd <- 1

impervious_fractions <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

#empty_vector <- length(impervious_fractions) 

sol <- predict_runoff(Rd, impervious_fractions, 182)
sol

df <- data.frame(impervious_fractions, sol)
df

ggplot(df, aes(x = impervious_fractions, y = sol)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Expected Stormwater Runoff as a Function of Impervious Cover", x = "Fraction of Watershed area considered Impervious (Acres)", y = "Expected Volume of Stormwater Runoff")
```
